#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
struct node
{long long int s;
long long int index;
struct node *next;
};


int main()
{struct node *start=NULL,*p,*temp;
long long int n,i,s1,m,q,k;
scanf("%lld",&n);
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{scanf("%lld %lld",&s1,&m);
temp=(struct node *)malloc(sizeof(struct node));
temp->s=s1*m;
temp->index=i;
if(start==NULL || temp->s > start->s)
{temp->next=start;
start=temp;
}
else
{p=start;
while(p->next!=NULL && temp->s <= p->next->s)
{
p=p->next;}
temp->next=p->next;
p->next=temp;
}
}
scanf("%lld",&q);
while(q--)
{scanf("%lld",&k);
p=start;
for(i=1;i<=k-1;i++)
p=p->next;
printf("%lld\n",p->index);
}
return 0;
}
